name: dicklaurent
text: Like we haven't all had that idea.

name: catachresis
text: Has anyone tried this, by the way? I STILL HOLD OUT DREAMS OF PERPETUAL MOTION DESPITE ALL LOGIC

name: psykeres
text: Dogg it's not perpetual motion if you need two tiny motors to keep the golf balls flying in and out. Those suckers eat electricity.

name: nathanielperson
text: Quit harshing my mellow, man.

name: semiquaver
text: Marshing?

name: songbirdspectre
text: Mallow marsher.

name: semiquaver
text: Yes'm.

name: songbirdspectre
text: filthy, filthy human! *waves finger*

name: semiquaver
text: Shm.  Nsh?

name: laserblade
text: No, see, the motors are powered by the golf ball.

name: soticoto
text: You make the second law of thermodynamics cry.

name: theunity
text: I wonder what Ben Affleck feels like when he approaches a piece of paper.

name: mortshire
text: like the apes when they approach the monolith in 2001.

name: jaypage
text: that is the perfect response, ever.

name: smilebuddha
text: SPLUT!

name: buttermoths
text: When Ben Affleck approaches a piece of paper his ass is probably hanging out, just like Ray's here.

name: the_stoned_one
text:
He just passes the piece of paper to Matt.
Both totally smiling.

name: semiquaver
text: You overcame your stoned nature and went totally fucking lucid.  For that you receive one chubby.

name: senseihollywood
text: reminds me of the unveiling of the Segway

name: deancain29
text: The second Matt Damon reference ever.

name: mortshire
text: and the first appearance of ray's full signature, such that it is.

name: straw
text: All with wings and whatnot

name: zem
text: at least someone made use of teodor's 'todd' logo

name: riazm
text: First appearance of Ray thinking he's channeling Einstein.

name: snowman
text: The perfect Matt Damon reference...ever!!

name: lizjones
text: Ray appears to have created an assless suit.

name: sp1derbaby
text: It's only assless when he sits down; the paper moves with the leg instead of stretching. Worthwhile couple of days for me, that.

name: sargasm
text: A comment left by sargasm was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, choosebro, stormagnet, Darthemed)

name: taiiga
text: those damn ball returners are ussually more trouble then they are worth, all making you jump everytime they spit out the ball, all erratic and unpredictable in speed and distance

name: crinklebat
text: I have a feeling that if there ever is a perpetual motion device, it will be made from something in SkyMall.

name: i_love_kate
text: The infinity symbol in quotation marks kills me.

name: cracklewater
text: I love how every word in the Matt Damon paragraph gets its own individual underline.

name: norrin
text: In case anyone would ever try to claim this discovery, they will be thwarted by the fact that Ray clearly wrote that he discovered it on the top right.

name: epicurus
text: IT'S SO... IMPORTANT...

name: speth
text: i actually drew up a perpetual motion device diagram with a friend while drunk in berlin once

name: charchar
text:
"(><)"
( This is really an infinity sign in AssetSpeak but it is really really a secret, okay? )

name: backdraft
text:
This strip reminds me of the time I suddenly knew Japanese: I was watching 'Black Rain' while high, and became amazed when I realised that I could understand what a couple of characters were saying to each other in Japanese. I became increasingly excited as I figured "Wow, six weeks of high school Japanese class has just paid off big time!"
Imagine my disappointment when I realised I could only understand them because I was also reading the subtitles...

I assume the next morning, Ray felt that same way.

name: littlefatdog
text: Later this forgotten drunken escapade will be subconsciously reawakened in a sober Ray .

name: canusdivinus
text:
The low friction area is completely unnecessary, as the rolling motion of the ball causes it to bypass friction.

Just saying.

name: kyrasmash
text: Berlin does some strange things to a man.

name: nohassles
text: A rare lapse in the three-horizontal-bar E style.

name: kalethan
text: this is so Five. The degree to which it is a five is above normal. For ME
